item.title: Life: A Game of Games
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Living in a complex world, everyday we’re moving from friend groups, to work, to chores, to dreams, to drama. Each and every area of life has such depths, that it seems like a world in itself. What can be gained, by looking at the metaphor of the game of games?
